author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Carsten Schinzer "ECommerce application, productdetail is not fully internationalized" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4962
The i18n in the productdetail.ftl is not complete when featuretree is used to define products. Missing bits:
Reference to existing UI Labels on div productdetail for sizes available
Using a UI Label instead of hard coded "choose option" on the AddItemForm

msg: Added a specialized version of stringify for bool and updated Flags.
